comments.body: If the actual building limit is higher than the height of the Nether, then simply increase the height of the Nether to the actual limit.
The nether roof isn't a intended feature
I would like to be able to build on the nether roof on bedrock. It would be so useful for farms and builds so please give the permission to build at nether roof
just let us build on the nether roof!!

I wasn't an intended feature but the won't get rid of it on java so it should be a very easy thing to do so both versions can take advantage of what is now a feature. I understand it started as a glitch but seeing as it's never been fixed because people were using it, it is now a feature.
Pls mojang it would be so useful
The netherite template makes making already hard to get netherite armor and tools even harder witch I don't think that new people in public servers will get the chance to get netherite stuff.
What if it broke instead and you could repair it with 7 diamonds?
By the time you ACTUALLY get the Smithing Template, you would likely know how other smithing templates work, and would thus know not to use it immediately

Diamonds should be reusable, for example, being dropped from a powerful creature, like the Warden. On regar way, advanced players who have lots of diamond needs could get them on an “eco-friendly” way
I dislike smithing templates and wish it went back to what it was before. Even having to use 5 netherright for a helmet would be better, like how you craft any other armor.

Yes!!!
Agree it!!!

I just now realized that elytra doesn’t go in your off hand I must been tired and rush making this post that’s one reason why I put use instead of can but it will be nice if somehow mojang let us see our durability without going into our inventory probably above the hungry bar
Please make off hand slot of bedrock like java
I’m pretty sure you just need to add the cape to your selected skin.
No. just leave it at your spawn point lol
Yep that should definitely be a feature for Minecraft and add Maps that have a skull on it were you die hmm?
Maybe it would be better to add Soulbound enchantment for compass, also it may be used for other items in creative mode for map creating

Player: Just made it out of the deep dark with my new compass! I'm gonna use it to find my stuff when I die.

*sculk shrieker noises*

Player: Guess I wasn't out of the deep dark yet... Shoot.

Warden: *one-shots the player*

Player: Oh no I died, good thing I have my new compass! Oh...

 

And that is why the Recovery Compass is useless. When you die, it drops along with the stuff it's supposed to help you find.
Instead of only working under y0, it should be more like Basalt Generators, where it requires special parameters.
Maybe if lava touches water and tuff?
Patterned carpet good
The carpet is usually embroidered, I think it is worth introducing threads as a consumable in addition to the dye.
if they brought story mode back with herobrine... man would that be insane
They still haven’t released season 2 jeez
Man that would be cool! cuz I have not seen a episode of the story mode since I was 6 man if there was herobrine i would of just quit high school and watch it

Add herobrine as a boss after ender dragon?. Make it to where you need a key to enter his castle in the nether for example. One part of the key comes from the ender dragon, one comes from a woodland mansion, and one comes from a nether fortress. Build the key, go to his castle and boom bossfight.

We already had a Combat Update.
Shields can easily be disabled by using an axe.
Stamina is the same as the hunger bar. "which is lost by doing certain actions like sprinting, fighting, and dodging", These are roughly the same actions that make the hunger bar go down.
I believe dodging would be a little too game-breaking. It would make fights even longer then they already are, and be too overpowerfull, you'd have a shield and be able to dodge... We already have shields which takes the place of being able to dodge, both stop you from taking damage so might aswel leave one out.

Nice thinking but I don't think these suggestions will make it into the game.

*Falls 40 blocks, hits opponent... both of us die*

Me: A soul for a soul.
I have the same issue. 1.18.2 is just Terribly laggy i have a high spec computer and im only get 40 to 60fps sometimes 70 to 80 max this needs a fix asap
My 2 bro :( !
Like the idea. I think that this goes well in to the game because of them adding Real life Moon cycles
This would be awesome also maybe special rare mobs could spawn during the moon phases. maybe werewolves or packs of dire wolves during the blood moon ect :)
it would look great
It is already on the switch-

Hello, this appears to be a non-English post. Below you will find a transcription of the topic being discussed.

Title: “I want you to add a gyro function to Nintendo Switch”

Text: “The Nintendo Switch has a gyro function. Intuitive operation is possible by moving the controller freely. I find it inconvenient just to operate the stick. By all means, I would like you to add a gyro function to the Nintendo Switch.”

- Translated by Admin.

Probably this person
Maybe I was trying to ask you to add a gyro to the Switch version of Minecraft
I love the idea it would also help role play I guess
you dont have to pay to make skins, there are websites out there that let you make skins. Minecraft also lets you upload said skins so you can use them :\
Yea you can get 3rd party apps and import the skins
Yes, I have wanted this for years!
I totally agree! It sound soo cool. Finger crossed
They couldn't even if they wanted to they don't own the rights to Star wars
They couldn't even if they wanted to they don't own the rights to Star wars
You can one shot a full protection 4 netherite player with a multishot crossbow with harming 2.

or you could just, take cover(with blocks). Also a multi-shot crossbow can't have piercing, so shields counter it anyways. It's an end game item basically none uses because it isn't worth the effort to obtain, why would you nerf it? Like if it needs a nerf, nerfing the magic damage would basically make it worthless. By the time you get these on a PVP server most people will already be getting nether rite (even with Dimond I think you still need three shots to kill). As for survival, they're too expensive to use consistently and heal undead. They maybe usable with infinity but then you can't have mending. None touches them fix the acquisition before nerfing.
The C&C update added the freezing functionality for snow and leather armor.
Actually adding Seasons would be great too. They should also then add clothes to the game, since even Leather Armor would get hot in the desert.

I don't know much about programming or creating games, but it would make sense to me to have a new status bar: the Temperature bar or something like that. It would let Players know if they're in danger of freezing or burning. Armor could then have another use; keeping you warmer when you're traversing a Snowy Biome, or climbing an Extreme Hills mountain. Also, Water Bottles would be much more useful, keeping your Temperature down when traversing a Desert or Mesa or even a Savannah. This addition (if added) would make going to the Nether so much harder, though, as water cannot exist in the Nether.

YES! This is exactly what I was thinking, too! Maybe add insulating armor to combat the cold. There should be a bar added to the HUD that shows how warm or cold you are and you have to stay in the middle (not too warm and not too cold) by taking off or putting on armor or some other clothing.
That would be better if you have to look at the 8 moon phases in order to get the advancement instead of just looking at one
SI PAAAAA
Si que capte los efectos atrás vez de control que se sienta cuando partes un bloque y cuando te ataquen  o cuando te quemes o te ahogues los latidos del corazón
Yes this should happen since they have it in bedrock edition and it’s a really cool way to express yourself

I lile this it's a good idea.
Also this can be a good balancer to add new tier tools into the game
This is a great idea so that players use cave mining instead, without annoyingly affecting stone near the surface. Could there also be an important ore which only generates around cave walls?
A good example of this is in Astroneer, the deeper you go the harder the stone is. They should also be different types of stone.
I made a post slightly similar to this, nevertheless, minecraft needs to be more difficult on console.
